meanings.definition: The quality or state of being periodic.
meanings.sent1: The periodicities of the waves were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the periodicities of natural phenomena to understand patterns.
meanings.sent3: The periodicities of the clock's ticking made it seem like it was talking to me.
meanings.sent4: The periodicities of the seasons changing remind us of the circle of life.
meanings.sent5: The periodicities of the music's rhythm created a sense of harmony in the room.

meanings.definition: The tendency to recur at regular intervals.
meanings.sent1: She noticed the periodicities of her cat's meowing every morning.
meanings.sent2: The periodicities of the train schedule helped commuters plan their day.
meanings.sent3: The periodicities of the birds chirping outside seemed like a natural alarm clock.
meanings.sent4: The periodicities of the sun rising and setting mark the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The periodicities of the traffic jams during rush hour were predictable yet frustrating.
